configurations.name: Flash Ploopy
configurations.command: ;qmk clean; banner PLOOPY ; banner FLASH; qmk flash -kb ploopyco/trackball -km b- -j 8 && exit

configurations.name: Compile Ploopy
configurations.command: ;qmk clean; banner PLOOPY ; qmk compile -kb ploopyco/trackball -km b- -j 8 && exit

configurations.name: Compile Drop Alt
configurations.command: ;qmk clean; banner DROP ALT ; qmk compile -kb massdrop/alt -km b- -j 8 && exit

configurations.name: FLASH Drop Alt
configurations.command: ;qmk clean; banner DROP ALT ; qmk flash -kb massdrop/alt -km b- -j 8 && exit
